verses.verse: Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> an exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> large <S%H6099><s%> number <S%H6099><s%> of livestock. <S%H4735><s%> So when they saw <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Jazer <S%H3270><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> that it was indeed <S%H2009><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> suitable <S%H4725><s%> for livestock, <S%H4735><s%>

the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and to the leaders <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Ataroth, <S%H5852><s%> Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> Nimrah, <S%H5247><s%> Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> Elealeh, <S%H500><s%> Sebam, <S%H7643><s%> Nebo <S%H5015><s%> and Beon, <S%H1194><s%>

the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> conquered <S%H5221><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> is a land <S%H776><s%> for livestock; <S%H4735><s%> and your servants <S%H5650><s%> have livestock. <S%H4735><s%> "

And they said, <S%H559><s%> "If <S%H518><s%> we have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> let this <S%H2088><s%> land <S%H776><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> to your servants <S%H5650><s%> as a possession; <S%H272><s%> do not take <S%H5674><s%> us across <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>"

But Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> "Shall your brothers <S%H251><s%> go <S%H935><s%> to war <S%H4421><s%> while you yourselves <S%H9043><s%> sit <S%H3427><s%> here <S%H6311><s%>?

"Now why <S%H4100><s%> are you discouraging <S%H5106><s%> <S%H3820><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from crossing <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> them?
"This <S%H3541><s%> is what <S%H3541><s%> your fathers did <S%H1><s%> when I sent <S%H6213><s%> them from Kadesh-barnea to see <S%H7971><s%> the land. <S%H7200><s%>

"For when they went <S%H5927><s%> up to the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol <S%H812><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> they discouraged <S%H5106><s%> <S%H3820><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> so that they did not go <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> them.
"So the Lord's anger <S%H639><s%> burned <S%H2734><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> and He swore, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

'None <S%H518><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> who came <S%H5927><s%> up from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> for they did not follow <S%H310><s%> Me fully, <S%H4390><s%>

except <S%H1115><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenizzite <S%H7074><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> for they have followed <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> fully. <S%H4390><s%>'

"So the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> burned <S%H2734><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and He made them wander <S%H5128><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the entire <S%H3605><s%> generation of those who had done <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord was destroyed. <S%H8552><s%>

"Now behold, <S%H2009><s%> you have risen <S%H6965><s%> up in your fathers' place, <S%H8478><s%> a brood <S%H8635><s%> of sinful <S%H2400><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> to add <S%H5595><s%> still <S%H5750><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> to the burning <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"For if you turn <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> Him, He will once <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> abandon <S%H5117><s%> them in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> and you will destroy <S%H7843><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>"

Then they came <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to him and said, <S%H559><s%> "We will build <S%H1129><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> sheepfolds <S%H6629><s%> <S%H1448><s%> for our livestock <S%H4735><s%> and cities <S%H5892><s%> for our little <S%H2945><s%> ones; <S%H2945><s%>

but we ourselves <S%H587><s%> will be armed <S%H9139><s%> ready <S%H2363><s%> [to go] before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H518><s%> we have brought <S%H935><s%> them to their place, <S%H4725><s%> while our little <S%H2945><s%> ones <S%H2945><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> in the fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

"We will not return <S%H7725><s%> to our homes <S%H1004><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has possessed <S%H5157><s%> his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

"For we will not have <S%H5157><s%> an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> with them on the other <S%H5676><s%> side <S%H5676><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> and beyond, <S%H1973><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> has fallen <S%H935><s%> to us on this side <S%H5676><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the east. <S%H4217><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "If <S%H518><s%> you will do <S%H6213><s%> this, <S%H2088><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you will arm <S%H9139><s%> yourselves before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for the war, <S%H4421><s%>

and all <S%H3605><s%> of you armed <S%H9139><s%> men cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> He has driven <S%H3423><s%> His enemies <S%H340><s%> out from before <S%H6440><s%> Him,

and the land <S%H776><s%> is subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> then afterward <S%H310><s%> you shall return <S%H7725><s%> and be free <S%H9345><s%> of obligation <S%H9345><s%> toward <S%H4480><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and toward <S%H4480><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> land <S%H776><s%> shall be yours for a possession <S%H272><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"But if <S%H518><s%> you will not do <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> you have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and be sure <S%H3045><s%> your sin <S%H9128><s%> will find <S%H4672><s%> you out.

"Build <S%H1129><s%> yourselves cities <S%H5892><s%> for your little <S%H2945><s%> ones, <S%H2945><s%> and sheepfolds <S%H1448><s%> for your sheep; <S%H6792><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> what you have promised <S%H3318><s%>. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6310><s%>"

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Your servants <S%H5650><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as my lord <S%H113><s%> commands. <S%H6680><s%>

"Our little <S%H2945><s%> ones, <S%H2945><s%> our wives, <S%H802><s%> our livestock <S%H4735><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> our cattle <S%H929><s%> shall remain <S%H1961><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead; <S%H1568><s%>

while your servants, <S%H5650><s%> everyone <S%H3605><s%> who is armed <S%H9139><s%> for war, <S%H6635><s%> will cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as my lord <S%H113><s%> says. <S%H1696><s%> "

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H6680><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> concerning them to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and to the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers' [households] of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "If <S%H518><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> everyone <S%H3605><s%> who is armed <S%H9139><s%> for battle, <S%H4421><s%> will cross <S%H5674><s%> with you over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> will be subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> them the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> for a possession; <S%H272><s%>

but if <S%H518><s%> they will not cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> with you armed, <S%H9139><s%> they shall have <S%H270><s%> possessions <S%H270><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%> "

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "As the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H1696><s%> to your servants, <S%H5650><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> we will do. <S%H6213><s%>

"We ourselves <S%H5168><s%> will cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H9139><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and the possession <S%H272><s%> of our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> [shall remain] with us across <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to them, to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and to the half-tribe of Joseph's son <S%H1121><s%> Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Sihon, <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> and the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og, <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> with its cities <S%H5892><s%> with [their] territories, <S%H1367><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the surrounding <S%H5439><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Dibon <S%H1769><s%> and Ataroth <S%H5852><s%> and Aroer, <S%H6177><s%>
and Atroth-shophan and Jazer <S%H3270><s%> and Jogbehah, <S%H3011><s%>
and Beth-nimrah and Beth-haran as fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and sheepfolds <S%H1448><s%> for sheep. <S%H6629><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> and Elealeh <S%H500><s%> and Kiriathaim, <S%H7156><s%>

and Nebo <S%H5015><s%> and Baal-meon – [their] names <S%H8034><s%> being changed <S%H5437><s%> – and Sibmah, <S%H7643><s%> and they gave <S%H7121><s%> [other] names <S%H8034><s%> to the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they built. <S%H1129><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> it, and dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> the Amorites <S%H567><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were in it.
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> to Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and he lived <S%H3427><s%> in it.
And Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> its towns, <S%H2333><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> them Havvoth-jair.

And Nobah <S%H5025><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> Kenath <S%H7079><s%> and its villages, <S%H1323><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> it Nobah <S%H5025><s%> after his own name. <S%H8034><s%>
